data.title: Casper – Amy Brenneman
data.meta_description: Casper An afterlife therapist and his daughter meet a friendly young ghost when they move into a crumbling mansion in order to rid the premises of wicked spirits. Starring: Bill Pullman, Christina Ricci, Cathy Moriarty, Amy Brenneman, More…Director: Brad Silberling https://theamybrenneman.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/AB_Casper_TalksToCasper_720FIN.mp4https://theamybrenneman.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/AB_Casper_TalksToHusband_720FIN.mp4 Casper! I still get recognized as The Red Angel by kids of all ages! […]
data.text: Casper! I still get recognized as The Red Angel by kids of all ages! What an amazing thing to be a part of an iconic film. Casper was directed by my husband Brad – we were not yet married, so apologies to the crew for our canoodling. Brad was chosen by his mentor Steven Spielberg to shoot this audacious film. There had never before been a film with computer-generated animated characters in scenes with human beings. The film took a solid two years to make, and it clearly stands the test of time. I am grateful to be a small part of Casper. Long live Amelia the Angel.
